thread.section_title: Dracakis Jewellers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dracakis Jewellers | dracakis.com.au
thread.title: Gary Simpson
thread.title_full: Dracakis Jewellers reviewed by Gary Simpson

author: Gary Simpson
title: Gary Simpson
text:
I recently went to Dracakis Jewellers at Mosman to purchase something special for my wife's Birthday. I was very impressed with the level of service and advice and also the quality of the jewellery and would not hesitate to recomend them to family and friends. My very delighted wife is looking forward to her next Birthday!!!
Gary.S.
